purgatorio-1.title: VENUS
purgatorio-1.quote: Venus, that beautiful planet that kindles love, / made the whole eastern sky laugh with light, / veiling the constellation Pisces in her train.

purgatorio-1.title: CATO OF UTICA
purgatorio-1.quote: I saw beside me a solitary old man / whose appearance commanded such reverence / that no son could owe a father more.

purgatorio-16.title: MARCO THE LOMBARD
purgatorio-16.quote: "I'll follow as far as I'm allowed," / he answered. "If smoke blocks our sight, / hearing will keep us joined instead."

purgatorio-18.title: THE SLOTHFUL
purgatorio-18.quote: But this drowsiness was suddenly taken from me / by people who had already come around / behind our backs.

purgatorio-19.quote: "What reason," he said, "has bent you down like this?" / And I replied: "Your dignity / standing made my conscience sting with remorse."

paradiso-31.quote: In form, then, of a pure white rose / the sacred host appeared to me— / those whom Christ made his bride with his own blood.
